text.t2ca155a: Home » Locations » Pleasanton
text.tn5cd385f8: This jail is in Oakland and houses exclusively male inmates. It’s rare that someone arrested in Pleasanton will be taken here.
text.tn4bfcf677: Driving Directions to Summit Defense’s Office in Pleasanton
text.t384c265e: Merge onto 680 going South for 6 miles, passing Bishop Ranch Regional Preserve and California High School. Take exit 29 and take a quick right onto Stoneridge Dr. Take another right onto Stoneridge Mall Rd. Pass Stoneridge Apartment Community and Sears on your left. Our office is on your right.
text.t7986a963: Get onto I-680 N for 7 miles, passing Castlewood Country Club, Meadlow Park, and Muirwood Community Park on your left. Take exit for Stoneridge Dr. When you see Lock It Up Storage on your right, take a left onto Stoneridge Dr. Pass over South San Ramon Creek and under I-680, then take a right onto Stoneridge Mall Rd. Continue on Stoneridge Mall Rd. passing IAFF Local 1974 on your right. Our office is on your right.
text.tn4c42c19a: From Castro Valley, get onto I-580 E for 10 miles, passing Don Castro Regional Recreation Area and Dublin Hills Regional Park. Take exit 44B onto I-680 towards San Jose. Take exit 29 for Stoneridge Dr. Take a quick right onto Stoneridge Mall Rd., passing Stoneridge Apartments and Blackhawk Network. Our office is on your right.
text.tn73569ee8: Successful Case Results in San rafael
text.t7b36c6f8: I was to express my gratitude and appreciate for everything this firm has done for me!! Got my THIRD DUI and was facing serious jail time but attorney Rabin worked his magic and utilized his resources and i didn’t spend a single day in jail!! When I was shopping around for law firms / defense attorneys I had no idea what to look for, it was nothing short of a BLESSING, hiring Summit Defense! THANK YOU, THANK YOU, and THANK YOU AGAIN!! Forever grateful for this AMAZING TEAM!
text.ta7b2db1: Mr. Nabizadeh is trustworthy, upfront and delivered amazing results.  One of the most creative thinkers I have ever met.
text.tn1612e7a6: Referred to these guys by my divorce attorney and I can’t be happier with the outcome. Dui dismissed and only a traffic ticket on my record.
text.tncd1a2af: By far the most professional team of criminal lawyers in the bay.  Managed to deliver on every promise while keeping me informed.
text.t66c37eb: I never imagined I would need a criminal lawyer (have had many other types) but Summit Defense is truly a gifted team of trial lawyers.  Collin Moore, Jessica and the whole firm were just amazing.  Highly recommend.
text.t57fddd83: Can’t be more pleased with the outcome of the case.  Collin worked tirelessly to convince the District Attorney not to file charges.  Fees were reasonable compared to other quotes I got.  Strongly recommend if you need a criminal lawyer.

textarea.tan3812dde9:

textarea.tan7ece3ca0:
5151 Gleason Dr, Dublin, CA

Cases Handled: This is one of several courthouses throughout Alameda County. As of June 21, 2017, the court location for all in custody arraignments will be , CA 94568 across from the Santa Rita Jail.

‍Phone: 925-227-6700
textarea.tan78149123:
You can find information about your case online, up to five days in advance on this calendar.

You can also call the clerk’s office between the hours of 8.30am and 2.30pm on (925) 227-6796.
textarea.ta2e49176b: Most people arrested in Pleasanton are taken to this facility on Broder Blvd. in Dublin. This jail houses both men and women, and both pre-trial and sentenced inmates.
textarea.tan1ac828a7: Merge onto I-580 W for 9 miles, passing Las Positas Golf Course, San Francisco Premium Outlets, and Dublin Sports Grounds. Take exit 448 toward San Jose, then exit 29 for Stoneridge Dr. Take another right onto Stoneridge Mall Rd, passing Cost Plus World Market, Play It Again Sports, and JCPenny Home Store, our office will be on your right.

textarea.tan26e20b73: Incredible lawyers. My son was facing serious charges and jail. Got case reduced and priors dismissed. Would highly recommend this group.

richtext.rn6bd6a227:
ACCUSED OF A CRIMINAL OFFENSE? CONTACT A PLEASANTON CRIMINAL DEFENSE ATTORNEY.

We handle all misdemeanor, felony and juvenile cases arising in the East Bay regions Dublin-Pleasanton and Livermore. With Over 120 years of Criminal Defense experience, our team relies on each other’s background, motion banks, success and past failure in tailoring the best defense for your case.

We handle the following crimes on a regular basis:

  • Domestic Violence
  • DUI/Drunk Driving
  • Theft and Shoplifting
  • Sex Offenses
  • Embezzlement
  • Hit and Run
richtext.r45ab721f: The Alameda County Sheriff’s Department runs the Santa Rita Jail, and sets the rules for all visits and other contact with inmates.
richtext.r16b1453d: Both the GDJ and the Santa Rita Jail are under the control of the Alameda County Sheriff’s Office. To find out which jail someone is being held at, you can search for inmate information online here, or call the GDJ on (510) 268-7777.
